Ah, the famous `diamonds` dataset from **ggplot2**. With the **plotly** package, we can make this graph of interactive

```r
library(plotly)
library(rolldown)

p1 <- ggplot(diamonds) +
  geom_freqpoly(
    aes(
      x = log(price), 
      color = clarity
    )
    stat = "density"
  ) +
  facet_wrap(~cut)
ggplotly(p1)
```
